questions: Can I wear my hat serving on a jury?
Do jurors need to wear special clothing to participate?
Is There a Dress Code For Jurors Reporting?
What do I need to wear during jury duty?
answers: Jurors reporting for service should wear clothing appropriate for an appearance in court. Shorts, t-shirts, uniforms, or clothing containing statements or offensive symbols are not permitted. All hats must be removed when in a courtroom.advisable.
